string.text: Return to the dealer as soon as possible.
Help out the imprisoned Duty stalker.
Set the Duty stalker free from bandit captivity. Find the captive in the basement of the bandit base.
Set the Duty stalker free from bandit captivity. Find the captive in the basement of the bandit base.
Unknown stalker is asking for help.
Unknown stalker is asking for help. Find him on the neglected fuel station.
